attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After Completing So Many Years Service Let Specials Become Full time officers, in this time period AS specials they would be trained to do the job by there station or OCU while serving as a special.  This would reward SPECIALS for the hard work and commitment.  Or will the government continue to turn there back on them,and give no rewards to serving SCs.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
